function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate space utilization strategies","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential outbreaks, and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Implementing effective space utilization strategies, such as spacing, ventilation, and hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Occupancy simulation tools, ventilation systems, and IoT sensors","People":"Occupants of the built environment, business owners, and public health officials","Owner":"Business owners, public health agencies, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Occupant vulnerability in the built environment leading to potential exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of staff or occupants being in vulnerable positions and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Using occupant-oriented output visualization to identify vulnerable positions and adjust work schedules, implementing safety protocols and guidelines","Technologies":"Occupancy simulation tools, IoT sensors, and safety monitoring systems","People":"Business owners, human resource managers, staff in different industries, and public health officials","Owner":"Business owners, human resource managers, and public health agencies"}]}
